title: Video Clip From a Film Shared as Vivekananda’s Speech in Chicago
subtitle: Fact Check of Swami Vivekananda Speech: The claim with which the video clip was posted is not true. Clip is from the film ‘Vivekananda By Vivekananda’.The film is based on biographical book of Swami Vivekananda book named Swami VIvekananda on Himself
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video clip was posted on Facebook by a user named Sachin Kumar on 1 October with the claim that the video is a rare original of Swami Vivekananda’s speech, delivered in Chicago on 13 September 1893.

The claim along with the video reads, “दुर्लभ_ओरिजनल_वीडियो शायद कितने ही भाई होंगे जिन्होंने आजतक हिदू ह्रदय सम्राट श्री स्वामी विवेकानंद जी को देखा भी नही होगा जिन्होंने डूबते हुए सनातन धर्म को बचाया उन्हीश्री स्वामी विवेकानंद जी का ये एक दुर्लभ वीडियो लाया हूँ स्वामी विवेकानन्द ने अमेरिका के शिकागो में 13 सितम्बर 1893 को दिया व्याख्यान।जरूर सुने |” (There are many who have not seen Hindu Hriday Samrat Shri Swami Vivekananda, the man who is the saviour of Sanatan Dharma. I bring for them rare video of Swami Vivekananda’s speech in America’s Chicago delivered on 13 September 1893.”)
